Cherrycake\Modules\Security::generateSlug

Generates a valid slug based on the given string

    Signature

    public function generateSlug(string $string, [string $separator = "-", [integer $minLength = 1, [integer $maxLength = 140, [boolean $isLowercase = true, [boolean $isAllowNumeric = true]]]]] )

    Parameters

    $string — string
    The base string
    $separator — string
    The separator to use when needed
    $minLength — integer
    The minimum length of the generated slug. Resulting slugs shorter than this will be considered invalid and return false.
    $maxLength — integer
    The maximum length of the generated slug. Resulting slugs will be cut to this maximum length
    $isLowercase — boolean
    Whether to generate an all-lowercase slug or not
    $isAllowNumeric — boolean
    Whether to allow for slugs that are entirely numeric or not

    Returns

    mix
    The slug, or false if it couldn't be generated
